config guilds add-rank.description: Links a Hypixel guild rank to a Discord role.

options.name: guild
options.description: The name of the guild that holds the rank.

options.description: The role to link to the rank.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
rankNotFound: The rank **{rank}** does not exist in the **{guild}** guild.

config guilds remove-rank.name: remove-rank

options.name: guild
options.description: The name of the guild that holds the rank.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
removedRank: The rank **{rank}** in guild **{guild}** has been unlinked.

*.note: Catches all errors that aren't here.
message:
An unhandled error occured. This has been reported.

{e.__class__.__name__}: {e}

0.note: Raised in config edit if an invalid option is chosen.

1.note: Raised in config edit if an invalid value is chosen.
message: {value} is not a valid value for that option.

2.note: Raised in config edit if an un-assignable role is chosen.
message: {role.mention} cannot be used because it's managed and cannot be assigned.

3.note: Raised when adding guilds if the guild already exists
message: That guild has already been linked to this server.

4.note: Raised when trying to edit a guild that doesnt exist in db
message: That guild has not been added to this server.

5.note: Raised when adding a guild rank that already exists
message: That rank has already been linked to a role.

6.note: Raised when trying to edit a guild rank that doesnt exist in db
message: That rank has not been added to this server.
